about.description: Professional with a career in IT development, with experience in software development for companies in sectors such as fintechs and back-office projects. Proficient in front-end development, with solid knowledge of back-end, using JavaScript as the foundation for my services. I am always looking to bring technological solutions to business challenges. Currently, I am seeking new opportunities in both the national and international markets. Good communication skills and commitment to deadlines and tasks.
